document.discussion_title: Appleton Farms to host Mother’s Day celebration
document.topic_text: Posted Apr. 21, 2016 at 7:00 AM Posted Apr. 21, 2016 at 7:00 AM IPSWICH Appleton Farms will host a Mother’s Day celebration with a Swiss theme. Mothers and children may sample homemade breakfast items from the farm kitchen and fondue bar, listen to live music and meet baby animals. Event basics WHAT: Appleton Farms to host Mother’s Day celebration. WHEN: 10 a.m. to noon May 8. WHERE: Appleton Farms, 219 County Road, Ipswich. COST: This program costs $24 for Trustees of the Reservation member adults and $9 for children. Tickets for nonmembers cost $30 for adults and $15 for children. Mothers and children ages 1 and younger receive free admission. INFO: For information and registration, call 978-356-5728 or visit thetrustees.org . Would you like to see your event in this space? Email information and photos to nscalendar@wickedlocal.com. North of Boston
